description:
Yamato Alexander is working out once again in Schwarz Rose`s gym. Even among the members of Schwarz Rose, Alec is particularly aloof. What made him want to become a street-style Prism Star? While he recalls the past, a surprising person waits for him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yamato Alexander: The Charisma of Street
Yamato Alexander: The Charisma of Street
大和アレクサンダー THE CHARISMA OF STREET
